companies.company_name: Federated Hermes Sust High Yield Bond A

key_risks: Greenwashing risks due to potential scrutiny over the authenticity of its sustainability claims
Market volatility and credit risk from investments in high-yield (junk) bonds
Inconsistencies in ESG criteria application across regions and industries
Performance lag compared to benchmark, raising concerns about competitive returns
controversies: Underperformance relative to the ICE BofA US High Yield Bond Index in 2023
environmental_issues: Challenges in ensuring consistent ESG standards across diverse industries and regions
social_issues: Reliance on third-party ESG research and ratings agencies, which could introduce operational risks
governance_issues: Adaptation to evolving regulatory requirements in sustainable finance
